activities: Executing business communications, negotiations, transactions, and compliance with contractual and legal obligations, collecting and storing customer information, maintaining business records related to customer, suppliers, contractors, other business associates and employees.
personaldata: Organization information, client and customer information, employee information
recoursemech: NTS is committed to investigating and attempting to resolve complaints and disputes regarding the use and disclosure of Personal Data.  In the event that complaints cannot be resolved between NTS and any complainant, NTS will cooperate and participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the EU data protection authorities to resolve such disputes.
